cu.explanation_en: Setting the number of PUSCH threads to 0 will cause processing failures and prevent uplink data handling.

du.explanation_en: Setting the maximum MIMO layers to 0 will cause antenna configuration errors and prevent proper signal transmission.
du.explanation_zh: 將最大 MIMO 層數設定為 0 會導致天線配置錯誤，並阻止正確的信號傳輸。
